info.name: Qrion School Management API
info.description: Complete API collection for Qrion school management system including authentication, academic management, billing, and scholarships

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe X",
  "telephone": "6282284733405",
  "positionId": 1,
  "institutionName": "Demo School",
  "institutionAddress": "Jl. Demo No. 123, Jakarta"
}

request.description: Step 1: Register a new demo institution
Step 2: Verify OTP code sent during registration
Step 3: Request OTP for login. Available channels: WHATSAPP, SMS, EMAIL
Step 4: Verify login OTP and get JWT token. Token is automatically saved to collection variable.
Get specific academic year by ID
Get specific school class by ID
Get specific sub class by ID
